name: Grapple Gunner (Alex)
description:
Use your trusty grapple to venture deep into the mines!

Controls:

Mb1: Fire grapple (Hold to go further)

Mb2: Retract Grapple Entirely

Z: Retract Grapple / Pull yourself closer

R: Restart level 

This game was made within 10 days for VimJam3:

Focus: Multi-Use

Theme: Turn Up The Heat

Programmers: Alex (Me), Deekay and Richard

Cover Art: Ellie @elltoart on insta!

Music: CrossedKiller

Tilemap: Mostbestestgames
